Package main

Class SnakeGame

java.lang.Object
main.GameEngine
main.SnakeGame
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.event.KeyListener, java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.event.MouseMotionListener, java.util.EventListener
public class SnakeGame
extends GameEngine
Base class for this snake game; instantiates all core controllers, game engine, entity sprites and runs the main render loop. Singleton class, fetch running instance using SnakeGame.getGameInstance();

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes 
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    static class  SnakeGame.STATE
    The possible game states

    Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class main.GameEngine

    GameEngine.AudioClip, GameEngine.GamePanel, GameEngine.GameTimer

  • Method Details

    • main

      public static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)
      The entry point of this game. Creates the singleton instance.
      Parameters:
      args - The arguments passed to the program

    • init

      public void init()
      Initialise all the controllers for this instance
      Overrides:
      init in class GameEngine

    • graphicsReady

      protected void graphicsReady()
      When the graphics are ready, this method initialises all the UI fragments and changes the game state to the MENU

    • update

      public void update​(double dt)
      Called on each update tick. Changes the state of the game to the next queued state. If the game is paused, the PauseFragment is activated. If the game state is currently GAME, and the game isn't paused, then the entities and effects are updated.
      Specified by:
      update in class GameEngine
      Parameters:
      dt - The amount of time passed since the last tick

    • paintComponent

      public void paintComponent()
      Called when the game requests a repaint. If the graphics are ready, and the fragments aren't initialised, initialise them. Clear the game screen, and redraw the entities, effects and UI.
      Specified by:
      paintComponent in class GameEngine

    • keyPressed

      public void keyPressed​(java.awt.event.KeyEvent event)
      Dispatches the key event to the registered entities, unless the key was 'ESCAPE', in which case the game is (un)paused.
      Specified by:
      keyPressed in interface java.awt.event.KeyListener
      Overrides:
      keyPressed in class GameEngine
      Parameters:
      event - The KeyEvent to be dispatched

    • changeGameState

      public void changeGameState​(SnakeGame.STATE s)
      Change the game state to the one provided. Activates the fragments that must be active for the selected state.
      Parameters:
      s - The new game-state

    • scheduleGameStateChange

      public void scheduleGameStateChange​(SnakeGame.STATE s)
      Schedule a game-state change
      Parameters:
      s - The next game state

    • snakeDeath

      public void snakeDeath​(Player player)
      Notifies this game instance that the player provided has died.
      Parameters:
      player - The losing player

    • getPlayers

      public Player[] getPlayers()
      Returns the players currently playing
      Returns:
      Return the list of Player instances

    • startGame

      public void startGame​(int c)
      Start the game by creating the Player instances, and initialising the EntityController with the players. Spawn the initial ApplePickup, and schedule the game-state to change
      Parameters:
      c - The count of players

    • respawnApple

      public void respawnApple()
      Queue the respawn of another apple

      public void quitGame()
      Quit the game
